first_convo: Hello Dear! I'm sure youre wondering why I look so glamourous.
I know, I know. It's okay! You can ask! Ask me! Ask me! You can see it on my face can't you!
I'm daydreaming! My apologies. I just can't believe I was upset before!
That absolute hunk of man... my prince... well he wanted to surprise me after all! He made me the most BEAUTIFUL necklace, with the most PERFECT gems.
He does care after all! I'm so lucky to have him!
Well, our anniversary dinner is soon, so I'll have to leave you my dear. But it was nice seeing you!
